titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7678

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Aug 26 1862.
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec State --
Sir

1 Lieut: W. C. Burgher murdered 29 July 1862. (date of Com: Nov. 9, 1861)
2 Lieut: J. Redfearn promoted (date Com: same)
2 Lieut: Joseph D. Yontz pro: ( " " Ap. 8. '62)
2 Lieut: Tho. M. Likes -- pro: -- ( " " May 2, '62)
2 Lieut: John Henry -- dead -- -- ( " " Nov. 27, '61)
1 Lieut: F. Goodpaster -- pro. -- ( " " Mar 22. '62)
2 Lieut: Jno. A. Joyce pro -- -- ( " " " " ")
2 Lieut: N. C. Petree decd -- ( " " Nov 14, '61)
2 Lieut: L. L. Drown pro: -- ( " -- " " 19. ")

Resply
John W. Finnelll
Adjt. Genl. Ken. Vols:
